zoning.unset: You need to set your zone first! `>zone`
zoning.findZone:
Step 1: Find your timezone code here:
<http://kevalbhatt.github.io/timezone-picker/>

Step 2: Use `>zone America/Los_Angeles` but replace with your timezone!
